review_title: Great place to work and care for others
pros:
- 5 day week
- Annual allowance for health
- Bonus
- Challenging work environment to grow
cons: - extensive communication required with various teams

review_title: Working with children is very wonderful experience and i have a passion for the the child ministry
pros: I enjoyed working with compassion international, i got more opportunities to present jesus to my children and could guide them to choose right way.
cons: It was really a privilage to work with compassion international

pros: The model of working with children through churches is wonderful and the entire program has depth and can make a world of difference for the child
cons: It is a challenge to find working staff with strong passion and desire
